question: Who won the 2018 Oscar's best actor?
explanation: The 90th Academy Awards commonly referred to as Oscars was held at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles, California (US). The award presented in 24 categories by Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS), honouring best films of year 2017. The Shape of Water won the most number of awards totaling to four at the ceremony after it was nominated into highest 13 categories. It was followed by Dunkirk, nominated for eight categories and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri, nominated for seven categories. Gary Oldman won the bext actor for Darkest Hour as Winston Churchill. Best Actress: Frances McDormand (Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri as Mildred Hayes).
